title: Convenient Online Rent Payment, Leash Free Dog Park, Bookcases
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME', 'With premium finishes and wide-open spaces, each newly renovated floor plan from Retreat at Sweetwater brings you unparalleled luxury without sacrificing on comfort.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'OR Text', '61', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1394 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Designer Lighting*', '- Upgraded Hardware*', '- Double Vanity*', '- Crown Molding*', '- Walk-In Closets*', '- New Kitchen Appliance Package*', '- Tray Ceilings*', '- Modern Interior Paint Finishes*', '- Two Inch Blinds*', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Bookcases', '- Hardwood-Style Flooring*', '- Fireplace*', '*', 'In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Play Park', '- Carwash', '- Outdoor Kitchens', '- Online Maintenance Request', '- Optional Garage Parking*', '- Fitness Studio', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Cyber Café', '- Leash Free Dog Park', '- Package Receiving', '- Zero Deposit Community', '- Surface Parking', '- New Pool Lounge Area', '- New Online Services', '- Convenient Online Rent Payment', '*Additional Fee', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $20', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per month.', 'Aggressive breeds are prohibited.', 'Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.', 'Pet Rent Basis: Per Home', 'Max Number of Pets: 2', 'Pet Policy Fee Min/Max: $300 - $600', 'Income Requirements:', 'Require 3x the monthly rent and must show proof of income.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Retreat at Sweetwater', '3355 Sweetwater Rd, Lawrenceville, GA, 30044', 'Z7SRCVu5']
